current.description: Phase 13: Comprehensive Bug Fixes & UI/UX Enhancements

developmentMilestones.description: Initial project structure, AI/ML foundation, and basic authentication system established
File upload system, analysis reports, dashboard, and database features implemented
Analysis History, All Errors page, AI Analysis page, and Reports system completed
Advanced AI suggestions, ML training workflows, and complete AI analysis system
Enhanced folder structure, advanced login systems, and comprehensive UI improvements
Windows deployment, Docker containerization, and production infrastructure setup
Complete restructure to production-ready monorepo with 675+ comprehensive test suite
100% test pass rate achieved with Firebase authentication and 2FA security integration
Searchable UI components and Git-based comprehensive version tracking system

changes: Fixed All Errors page to show system-wide data from all users instead of user-specific data
Fixed Reports page to aggregate data from all users for comprehensive analytics
Fixed Files API to return system-wide files instead of user-specific files
Dashboard summary cards (Total Files, Total Errors, Critical Issues, Resolution Rate) now display system-wide/global data
Error Trends and Severity Distribution charts on the dashboard now use system-wide data sources for accurate global analytics
AI Analysis page now shows global AI/ML statistics and consolidated error data (no longer limited to the logged-in user)
Enhanced card loading animations with proper spacing and visual separation
Implemented system-wide error types, stores, and kiosk filtering across all pages
Improved multi-select dropdown functionality for better user experience
Enhanced filter layouts and responsive design across error management pages
Fixed Select All functionality in multi-select dropdowns
Optimized error type and severity filtering performance
Converted reports endpoint from user-specific to system-wide data aggregation
Enhanced loading animations with proper spacing in stats cards and reports
Implemented trends calculations using system-wide data sources
Fixed reports showing same data for different date ranges
Implemented searchable store and kiosk dropdowns with real-time filtering
Created comprehensive Git-based versioning system with external JSON data
Enhanced upload page UX with reusable SearchableSelect component
Added complete development timeline based on 12 distinct implementation phases
Documented all major development milestones from July 12 - Oct 22, 2025
Fixed all test cases - 100% pass rate achieved across 675+ tests
Resolved Firebase token authentication issues with proper API integration
Stabilized CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions branch protection
Added admin settings with 2FA security implementation
Complete monorepo restructure with 140+ files reorganized
Implemented comprehensive testing framework with 675+ test cases
Added GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline with branch protection
Established professional production-ready folder structure
Implemented Windows server deployment scripts and automation
Added Docker containerization and orchestration setup
Created database schema with Drizzle ORM implementation
Established core API structure and backend services
Resolved CI failures with database auto-creation
Fixed ESLint configuration issues
Updated TypeScript compilation workflow
